note: Polio is a highly infectious viral disease. The polio virus invades the nervous system and can cause irreversible paralysis.
title: Number of one-year-olds who have not received the inactivated polio vaccine
subtitle: The inactivated polio vaccine (IPV1) protects children against polioviruses types 1, 2 and 3. IPV does not replace the Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV), but is used with OPV to strengthen a childâ€™s immune system and protect them from polio.
